Optimisable
public class EcoBinModelOptimiser
extends EconomicModelOptimiser

This optimiser makes decisions on replication based on the binomial economic model.

Method Detail

chooseFilesToDelete

protected java.util.List chooseFilesToDelete(DataFile file,
                                             StorageElement se)
Uses the algorithm contained in EconomicBinomialStorageElement to determine whether replication should take place, and if so which file should be deleted.

Specified by:
chooseFilesToDelete in class ReplicatingOptimiser
Parameters:
file - The file we wish to replicate
se - The SE onto which file is to be replicated
Returns:
the files in se to delete, or null if replication isn't to take place
